title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
content: Baltic Honeybadger - 2 day conference in Latvia. Part of Riga Bitcoin week.This is a Bitcoin Only conference Tickets and information at… https://baltichoneybadger.com/This is an annual event ( apart from the Covid years ) since 2017 I believe. I’ve never been and not sure I’ll be able to this year - has anyone ever been ? What was it like ?

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Quote from: Tibu on June 09, 2022, 08:29:12 AMSee you there  Unfortunately I won’t make it     Family holiday and a wedding to go to.Have a great time and make sure to tell us how you get on
